turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a Grande Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, which store would you like to visit?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to the one on 8th street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, may I please have a tall coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, would you like any sugar with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like two sugars please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any milk in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, can I have 2 milks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like lowfat, 2%, or whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you have any 1/2 and 1/2?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Do you have any chocolate chip cookies today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We are all out, but we have crumb cake.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, how about a brownie?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, we have those. How many would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two of those please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That will be $15. Will that go on your Starbucks gift card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. Here it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks, that will cover it. That will be ready in 25 minutes. You have an account with us, so a receipt will be sent to you via text message. Have a great day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. You too!
